description: This file defines interfaces and structures for handling RBus interactions related to Ethernet agent link status, including function declarations for event handling, initialization, and status publishing within the RBus framework.
external_methods: rbusError_t getBoolHandler(rbusHandle_t handle, rbusProperty_t property, rbusGetHandlerOptions_t* opts)
rbusError_t eventSubHandler(rbusHandle_t handle, rbusEventSubAction_t action, const char* eventName, rbusFilter_t filter, int32_t interval, bool* autoPublish)
rbusError_t sendBoolUpdateEvent(char* event_name , bool eventNewData, bool eventOldData)

methods.name: getBoolHandler
methods.description: Handles retrieval of boolean properties over RBus.

methods.name: eventSubHandler
methods.description: Manages event subscriptions and notifications for RBus.

methods.name: initLinkStatus
methods.description: Initializes link status monitoring; implementation not shown in header.

methods.name: sendBoolUpdateEvent
methods.description: Sends an update event with boolean value over RBus.

methods.name: publishEWanLinkStatus
methods.description: Publishes the Ethernet WAN link status over RBus.

methods.name: ethAgentRbusInit
methods.description: Initializes RBus components related to Ethernet agent.

methods.name: EthAgent_Rbus_discover_components
methods.description: Discover and initialize RBus components; specific to certain hardware platforms.

calls: rbusError_t getBoolHandler(rbusHandle_t handle, rbusProperty_t property, rbusGetHandlerOptions_t* opts)
rbusError_t eventSubHandler(rbusHandle_t handle, rbusEventSubAction_t action, const char* eventName, rbusFilter_t filter, int32_t interval, bool* autoPublish)
rbusError_t sendBoolUpdateEvent(char* event_name , bool eventNewData, bool eventOldData)
